tool.name: FFEval
tool.description: Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
tool.command:
FFEval
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_truth: -truth $param_truth #end if #if $param_rt_tol: -rt_tol $param_rt_tol #end if #if $param_rt_tol_abs: -rt_tol_abs $param_rt_tol_abs #end if #if $param_mz_tol: -mz_tol $param_mz_tol #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_abort_reasons: -abort_reasons $param_abort_reasons #end if #if $param_out_roc: -out_roc $param_out_roc #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Feature input file, which contains the data to be tested against the truth file

param.name: param_truth
param.label: Truth feature file that defines what features should be found

param.name: param_rt_tol
param.label: Allowed tolerance of RT relative to average feature RT span

param.name: param_rt_tol_abs
param.label: Allowed absolute tolerance of RT (overwrites 'rt_tol' if set above zero)

param.name: param_mz_tol
param.label: Allowed tolerance in m/z (is divided by charge)

param.name: param_abort_reasons
param.label: Feature file containing seeds with abort reasons

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_FFEval.html
